argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mulrcn.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` R ) |
| 2 |  | invrcn.i | |- I = ( invr ` R ) |
| 3 |  | invrcn.u | |- U = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( mulGrp ` R ) = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 5 | 4, 3 | #P_tdrgunit | |- ( R e. TopDRing -> ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) e. TopGrp ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) |
| 7 | 4, 1 | #P_mgptopn | |- J = ( TopOpen ` ( mulGrp ` R ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_resstopn | |- ( J |`t U ) = ( TopOpen ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 6, 2 | #P_invrfval | |- I = ( invg ` ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_tgpinv | |- ( ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) e. TopGrp -> I e. ( ( J |`t U ) Cn ( J |`t U ) ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. TopDRing -> I e. ( ( J |`t U ) Cn ( J |`t U ) ) ) |
